summary: This folder implements a code generation engine that produces runnable, boilerplate-free Python loaders for specific datasets. It analyzes dataset manifests to automatically scaffold data streaming logic and media decoding helpers (images, audio, files) tailored to the dataset's schema.
responsibilities: Analyze dataset manifests to extract table schemas and media bindings.
Map dataset identifiers and column names to valid Python module and function names.
Generate standalone Python scripts that include dataset loading and batch streaming logic.
Inject specialized decoding helpers for image, audio, and file reference types.
Provide a CLI-ready interface for the 'warpdata init' command functionality.
